definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: When her husband was out she wore the trousers.
sentences.chinese: 當她丈夫不在時，她當家做主。

sentences.english: Don’t panic, I’m talking about just 15 minutes per day when your notebook reigns.
sentences.chinese: 別難過，我說的是每天用15分鐘讓筆記本做主。

sentences.english: The choice is yours, but be warned it could make you look a little girlish.
sentences.chinese: 你的選擇你做主，不過小心它讓你看起來有點女性化。

sentences.english: Throw in some Prosecco, and you may not even have to cook the second course.
sentences.chinese: 再加普羅塞克酒，你甚至都不用做主菜了。

sentences.english: I think I must study hard and get good grades and I maked it.
sentences.chinese: 我想我必須努力學習並取得好成績我做主。

sentences.english: She has grown up and can belong to herself.
sentences.chinese: 她已長大了，能自己做主了。

sentences.english: Finally the family, by leading from the financial sector formal debit pay blackmailers.
sentences.chinese: 最終由領導做主，正式從財務部門支款付給勒索者。

sentences.english: People always have the idea that men should wear the pants.
sentences.chinese: 人們一般覺得男人應該當家做主。

sentences.english: Creative freedom gives license to a player to do his own thing.
sentences.chinese: 自由度給了球員自做主張的許可。

sentences.english: Don't panic, I'm talking about just 15minutes per day when your notebook reigns.
sentences.chinese: 別難過，我說的是每天用15分鐘讓筆記本做主。

sentences.english: It was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness.
sentences.chinese: 這是智慧做主的年代，也是愚蠢當家的年代。

sentences.english: Chinese finally wear the pants in 1949.
sentences.chinese: 1949年中國人民終於當家做主了。

sentences.english: Being your own boss is one of the attractions of owning your own business.
sentences.chinese: 擁有自己的企業，誘人處之一是自己當家做主。

sentences.english: Learning is fun, and this month the world is your oyster.
sentences.chinese: 學習是快樂的，這個月，整個世界都由你做主。

definition: to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
to make a decision/to make up one's mind
to have the final say/to be the one in charge
lit. to go beyond the sacrificial altar and take over the kitchen (idiom); fig. to exceed one's place and meddle in other people's affairs/to take matters into one's own hands
to show an interest in/to get involved with
to do sth in place of sb else
to be in charge in one's own house (idiom)/to be the master of one's own affairs
to appear personally/to step in/to step forth/to show up
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
